Description.Text: The 20 million pound Cedar Court Grand Hotel & Spa will be York's first 5 star hotel and the flagship property of the Cedar Court Group. With stunning views of the Minster and the city's ancient walls, the hotel enjoys an enviable central location. Build in 1906 as one of the great railway buildings of York, the hotels graceful Edwardian architecture is complemented with fine dining and luxurious sap complex that features an indoor pool, gymnasium and treatment rooms. It's a boast many hotels make but at the Cedar Court Grand Hotel & Spa in historic York every room really is unique. This is because The Grand Hotel is set in the grade II listed former North Eastern Railway Headquarters, one of York's most iconic Edwardian buildings. Rooms range from loft-style spaces with views of York Minster to suites overlooking the famous city wall. Every detail is hand-finished and every element is carefully selected for comfort, luxury and design. Classic rooms have a bath with shower; selected Executive rooms have a walk-in shower. There are 13 luxury suites including the Penthouse, all of which benefit from The Grand's 24-hour personal butler service and valet. The Grand offers fiveluxury room styles: Classic, Executive, Deluxe, Suite and Penthouse. All feature luxury Molton Brown bath products, Egyptian cotton linen, powerful high speed WiFi connections, a wide choice of international TV channels and movies, flat screen TVs and a private bar. For luxury spa treatments and spa breaks in the heart of York, The Grand is the discerning choice. Set across a network of spacious rooms that once kept secure millions of pounds of railway capital, this cosy and inviting space within the vaults of the luxury Grand Hotel has been transformed into the perfect setting for bespoke holistic treatments. From five individually designed rooms - including one double - beauty professionals provide a range of treatments: from massage and facials to special treatments for pregnant women and couples. Molton Brown luxury beauty products are used throughout, nourishing, boosting and protecting your skin. And for those seeking a more energetic experience, there is a state-of-the-art gymnasium and 14 metre pool, as well as a Jacuzzi, sauna, and steam room. Luxury Spa Days and overnight Spa Breaks are also available, either to spoil yourself, or maybe you'd like to buy a spa voucher as a gift.

Located alongside York's historic wall, and just a five minute walk from the city's delightful maze of medieval streets and boutique shops, guests at The Grand Hotel are ideally placed for a city break in this hugely popular tourist destination. With views of York Minster, family friendly attractions nearby and endless options for romantic walks, The Grand Hotel is the perfect choice for every type of visitor. York is also an ideal location from which to explore Yorkshire - from the Brideshead elegance of Castle Howard, to the breathtaking landscapes of the Dales, to the vibrant city buzz of nearby Leeds.

Classic Room - The Grand offers five luxury room styles: Classic, Executive, Deluxe, Suite and Penthouse. All feature luxury Molton Brown bath products, Egyptian cotton linen, powerful high speed WiFi connections, a wide choice of international TV channels and movies, flat screen TVs and a private bar.
